Title: Takunomi.
Description: ['20-year-old Michiru Amatsuki moved to Tokyo after a career change, and now finds herself living in a woman only share house, Stella House Haruno, with a few other women of varying age and occupation. Every night the girls settle down and have a drink or two (or more) as drama ensues.']
Related: ['Parent story: Pokemon', 'Prequel: Pokemon: Pikachu no Fuyuyasumi (2000)']
Staff: [['Kobayashi, Tomoki', 'Director'], ['Hamano, Takatoshi', 'Sound Director'], ['Ishigura, Rei', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Takayama, Katsuhiko', 'Script, Series Composition']]
